text:
I've compiled  apache 2.0.48 withe following options:
CC=gcc CFLAGS='-DHARD_SERVER_LIMIT=1024' ./configure 
--prefix=/stage/keeper/src/apache2 \
--enable-modules="headers info mime_magic rewrite so status" \
--with-expat=$PWD/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat

make install breakes at the end:
mkdir /usr/local/apache2/manual
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/developer
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/faq
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/howto
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/images
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/misc
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/mod
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/platform
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/programs
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/search
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/ssl
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style/chm
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style/css
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style/man
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style/w3c
cp: not all requested changes were made to 
/usr/local/apache2/manual/style/xsl/util
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style/xsl
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style/zip
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style/lang
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style/latex
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/style
cp: not all requested changes were made to /usr/local/apache2/manual/vhosts
gmake[1]: *** [install-man] Error 1
gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/stage/keeper/src/httpd-2.0.48'
gmake: *** [install-recursive] Error 1


I use:
autoconf-2.58-1
automake-1.7.9-1
libtool-1.5-1
m4-1.4-14
make-3.80-1
gcc-2.9.aix51.020209-4
creator: keeper@fly.srk.fer.hr

text:
Any idea where /usr/local/apache2 came from?  your prefix is
--prefix=/stage/keeper/src/apache2

Are symlinks involved?

Did you change the --prefix parameter to configure without running "make
distclean" to clean up droppings of a previous configure?
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
Hello Jeff!

Very sorry I sent you a wrong copy of configure parameters. The right one:

CC=gcc CFLAGS='-DHARD_SERVER_LIMIT=1024' ./configure 
--prefix=/usr/local/apache2 \
--enable-modules="headers info mime_magic rewrite so status" \
--with-expat=$PWD/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat

There is no symlinks. I did configure;make;make install on fresh src copy.

Mario.
creator: keeper@fly.srk.fer.hr

text:
I've tried to compile apache2 on another AIX 5.2 ML2 box. I used:
autoconf-2.53-1
automake-1.5-1
libtool-1.4.2-1
m4-1.4-13
make-3.79.1-3
gcc-2.9.aix51.020209-3

I got the same make install error:
gmake[1]: *** [install-man] Error 1
gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/stage/keeper/src/httpd-2.0.48'
gmake: *** [install-recursive] Error 1
creator: keeper@fly.srk.fer.hr
keeper@fly.srk.fer.hr
text:
I forgot to mention: I have no problems compiling and installing apache2 from 
the same source and with same configure parameters on AIX 4.3.3 or AIX 5.1. 
This problem is present _only_ on AIX 5.2

Mario.

I think you'll have to experiment with permissions on /usr/local/apache2/manual
to see what will get make install to complete on that system.

Check for setgid bit on the directory.  Set permissions to just 0777 and see if
it works.

It works as-is if you install as root, correct?

(google for "not all requested changes were made to" to see common causes of
this with chmod command; I presume that issues for cp when trying to preserve
permissions are the same)
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
Hello Jeff!

I've tried with chmod 0777 on manual dir, but now I get the following:
gmake[1]: *** [install-man] Error 1
gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/stage/keeper/src/httpd-2.0.48'
gmake: *** [install-recursive] Error 1

chmod on man dir doesn't help.

Mario.
creator: keeper@fly.srk.fer.hr

text:
I've tried apache 2.0.49. It's the same thing. When I run make install as root, 
there is no problem.

Strange, this permission problem apears only on AIX 5.2

Mario.
creator: keeper@fly.srk.fer.hr

text:
The solution here is to use $(INSTALL) rather than cp thoughout the install-*
targets.
creator: jorton@redhat.com

text: *** Bug 29990 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com

text:
It looks like install is still using cp, but no more complaints
in 4 years.  Closing for now, can be re-opened if need be.
creator: poirier@pobox.com
